price: Kuma idan wata fizga ta fizge ka daga Shaiɗan, to ka nẽmi tsari ga Allah. Lalle Shĩ, Shĩ ne Mai ji, Masani.
arabic: وَإِمَّا يَنزَغَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ نَزۡغٞ فَٱسۡتَعِذۡ بِٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-immā yanzaghannaka mina al-shayṭāni nazghun fa-is'taʿidh bil-lahi innahu huwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
